Key Match Events: Breel Embolo put Switzerland ahead after 75 minutes
Bukayo Saka leveled the score five minutes later
Trent Alexander-Arnold scored the decisive penalty in the shootout
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Gareth Southgate praised the team's character, belief, and spirit
Bukayo Saka said he used the previous shootout defeat to motivate himself
England's next game is a semifinal against the Netherlands on Wednesday
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match went to extra time and penalties
Switzerland lost three of their four major tournament shootouts
England's record in shootouts now reads 3-7
